properties.title: Bike Kingdom
properties.abstract: The Bike Kingdom Lenzerheide with five different trails and a skill centre is a varied playground for beginners, families and experts.
properties.description:
The bike park extends across the first section of the Rothorn mountain railway from the base station to the intermediate station Scharmoin. You can choose from five different bike trails of varying difficulty (easy/medium/difficult). The skill centre at the base station consists of a pump track three dirt jumps, lines, a slope style section various wall rides, corners and three drops, a family area and a big air bag.

FLOWline
Difficulty level: easy (blue)
Characteristics: flow country trail in less steep terrain with a lot of flow, bends and small jumps. Perfect for beginners and families.

PRIMEline
Difficulty level: intermediate (red)
Characteristics: classic free ride trail with steep bends, banked turns, jumps and north shore elements. 

SHOREline
Difficulty level: intermediate/difficult (red/black)
Characteristics: north shore trail with endless wood bridges of varying degrees of difficulty.

STYLEline  
Difficulty level: intermediate/difficult (red/black)
Characteristics: playful slope style trail, which meanders through the forest. The trail features jumps, wall rides boxes and other elements. 

STRAIGHTline 
Difficulty level: difficult (black)
Characteristics: challenging downhill trail in steep terrain. The trail features big jumps, drops, steep turns and north shore elements.

Parking spaces are available at the base station. The closest postbus stop, Lenzerheide Rothornbahn, is right by the base station. There are bike shops and a bike school nearby.
properties.name: Ferienregion Lenzerheide
